name: Candy Land Mania
description:
Delicious! This Match 3 Puzzle game will have you satisfied for countless hours! Candy Land Mania is a unique puzzle game that involves delicious sweet treats!
Game interface is simple and easy to use, which makes it a perfect game for all ages.

[Gameplay]
-Match 3 or more of the same treats vertically or horizontally
-Earn tokens from leveling up and completing levels to buy Power-Ups!
-Power-Ups include: hints, the oven, and much more!
- Try our 3 different styles of gameplay: Levels, Timed, and Endless!

There's much more to experience and the best way to see all of it is to download Candy Land Mania right now!!







*NOTE: This game is free to play, but also offers in-game purchases made with real money.
